channel.title: Can't Connect to Anything!
channel.description:
I have tried the MoparScape 3.0 Client by going "File > New Server" and entering the exact IP of the server I want to use. I then hit "Enter" and then I type my user and pass and hit "Login". It NEVER works!
I've tried an old, basic client which is just "Username:" and "Server:" when you hit "Existing User".
I CAN play on/modify the private servers which I have downloaded the source for and have run the Compile.bat and Runserver.bat files.
But I just can't seem to connect to ANY SINGLE SERVER.
I've made sure that the people said they were online, etc etc.
Help, please? I used to be able to play on them every day, but now I can't. No matter what time, what server, what client, what IP, etc.
:( :(

item.title: Can't Connect to Anything!
item.dc:creator: @Blood_Realm Blood Realm
item.description:
@Blood_Realm wrote:

You have to use the IP address 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0 to connect to your own server. Then people will need to connect to the server IP.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't Connect to Anything!
item.dc:creator: @sirholkms sirholkms
item.description:
@sirholkms wrote:

I have no idea unless you have recently installed a new fire wall or virus protect because it might be blocking that port but thats all I can think of at the moment ill try figure it out later for you.

Read full topic
